about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in Abloom, an atmospheric exploration and puzzle game set in a once vibrant forest, now lifeless and consumed by a black hole. With the power of flight and swift ground movement at your disposal, navigate through this desolate landscape to solve enigmatic puzzles, lighting up the flora and fauna, and bringing back the radiant life that once flourished.

Witness a unique transformation as you move through the game. The forest, once dead and monochromatic, blooms back to life with vivid colors and vibrancy with each solved puzzle. Your journey is a cycle of death and rebirth, a testament to the enduring spirit of life in the face of adversity.

Abloom is crafted to be as accessible as possible, featuring a movement system that effortlessly merges simplicity and dynamism, making it equally engaging for both leisure players and gaming enthusiasts. Abloom is committed to inclusivity, with puzzles that emphasize shapes and logic, ensuring enjoyable gameplay beyond the boundaries of color perception.

Experience the rebirth of a world in Abloom. The forest awaits your touch to spring back to life.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

short_description: Experience a vibrant flight and slide through a dead forest, solve mysteries, and bring life back to a world consumed by a black hole in this atmospheric puzzle game.
